titleStmt.title: A treatise vpon sundry matters contained in the Thiry nine Articles of religion, which are professed in the Church of England long since written and published by Thomas Rogers.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Thomas, d. 1616.
Rogers, Thomas, d. 1616. Faith, doctrine and religion professed in England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Legatt, and are to be sold by Richard Thrale, at the signe of the Crosse-keyes at Pauls gate,

notesStmt.note: "First published in 1607 under title: The faith, doctrine and religion professed in England"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Crosse-keyes at Pauls gate
